website_summaries.verdict: This premium custom towing mirror offers a terrific fit, expert craftsmanship, and other exceptional features.
pros: Manual mirror is simple to install in just minutes
Offers injection-molded textured black plastic housing that delivers a wonderful combination of style and function
Provides an outstanding fit in comparison to many other custom towing mirrors
cons: Mirror sometimes shakes when a vehicle is moving
Does not come with installation instructions

customer_reviews.title: Made pretty well, my only complaint is that the detent ...
customer_reviews.text: Made pretty well, my only complaint is that the detent that holds the mirrors in driving position is a little different drivers side to passenger side. Not sure if it is possible to adjust that. I am probably the only person that will be able to see that. Easy to install. Seems like good visibility although I haven't pulled my camper with them yet. Came with no paperwork, just a well packed box with mirrors. Went to the DEDC web page to look into the position issue, the same mirrors sell for almost $400 !! No instructions though. Youtube has lots of instruction on install.
